output.name: CrimsonEchoFox
output.description: CrimsonEchoFox is a leading voice, video, and text communication platform built specifically for gamers. Since its founding in 2015, it has grown to serve over 200 million monthly users—90% of whom spend a combined 1.5 billion hours gaming on the platform each month. With high-quality streaming and seamless cross-device support for direct messages, group chats, and private servers, CrimsonEchoFox empowers friends to connect, coordinate, and hang out before, during, and after gameplay, shaping the future of multiplayer entertainment.

suboptimal.actual: CrimsonEchoFox is a leading voice, video, and text communication platform built specifically for gamers. Since its founding in 2015, it has grown to serve over 200 million monthly users—90% of whom spend a combined 1.5 billion hours gaming on the platform each month. With high-quality streaming and seamless cross-device support for direct messages, group chats, and private servers, CrimsonEchoFox empowers friends to connect, coordinate, and hang out before, during, and after gameplay, shaping the future of multiplayer entertainment.
suboptimal.ground: A voice, video, and text platform that helps friends come together to hang out, play games, and have fun. High quality streaming and a seamless experience across devices lets people play and interact together as if they were in person. Over 200 millions people use the platform every month.
